code:
stateDiagram-v2
id fix-events
%% inspiration: https://mermaid.js.org/syntax/stateDiagram.html
Still --> [*]
Still --> Moving
Moving --> Still : STOP %% named transition / event
Still --> Wreck : CRASH
Moving --> Wreck : CRASH
state Wreck {
	[*] --> Assess
	Assess --> Still , if: isDriveable
	Assess --> [*]
	}
Wreck --> [*] : onDone
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

repo_description: MermaidJS to XState (Finite State Machine) transformation
